DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to improve care practice related to gastrostomy management. This a before-after study, aimed at evaluating knowledge of care givers, families and patients about gastrostomy management. The intervention includes 1) A training in a care protocol for hospital care givers, and 2) A booklet for patients, families, and outpatient care givers. The evaluation criterion is a questionnaire to assess knowledge of hospital care givers, patients, families, and outpatient care givers.
DOC.brief_title: a Care Protocol for Caregivers and Parents of Children Recently Gastrostomised
DOC.criteria: parents and hospital care givers of children undergoing gastrostomy who accept to participate. family unable to understand French language, caregiver who has previously answered to the study questionnaire
